select h_photo.pno, email, pcontent, photo_simage, phits, plike, islike,PSCRAP,ISCRAP from h_photo, (select h_photo.pno pno, count(h_like.lno) plike from h_like, h_photo where h_photo.pno = h_like.pno(+) group by h_photo.pno) l, (select h_photo.pno pno, count(h_like.lno) islike from h_photo,h_like where h_photo.pno=h_like.pno(+) group by h_photo.pno) mlike, (SELECT H_PHOTO.PNO PNO, COUNT(H_SCRAP.SNO) PSCRAP FROM H_SCRAP, H_PHOTO WHERE H_PHOTO.PNO = H_SCRAP.PNO(+) GROUP BY H_PHOTO.PNO) SC, (SELECT H_PHOTO.PNO PNO, COUNT(H_SCRAP.SNO) ISCRAP FROM H_PHOTO,H_SCRAP WHERE H_PHOTO.PNO = H_SCRAP.PNO(+) GROUP BY H_PHOTO.PNO) MSCRAP where l.pno = h_photo.pno and mlike.pno=h_photo.pno and SC.pno = h_photo.pno and MSCRAP.pno=h_photo.pno and email=#{email}
